parameters.name: CredentialConfig
parameters.description: The authorization chain settings. For more information, see [Use authorization chains to access resources of other entities](~~465340~~).

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The time interval between two consecutive frames in a GIF or long image. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: MaxFrames
parameters.description: The maximum number of frames that can be captured in a GIF or long image. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: Notification
parameters.description: The notification settings. For information about the asynchronous notification format, see [Asynchronous message examples](~~2743997~~).

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. You can obtain the name of the project from the response of the [CreateProject](~~478153~~) operation.

parameters.name: Scenes
parameters.description: The scenarios in which you want to apply the image moderation task.

parameters.name: SourceURI
parameters.description:
The URI of the Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket in which you store the image.

Specify the value in the `oss://<Bucket>/<Object>` format. `<Bucket>` specifies the name of the OSS bucket that resides in the same region as the current project. `<Object>` specifies the complete path to the image file that has an extension.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The custom tags. You can search for or filter asynchronous tasks by custom tag.

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: The user data, which is returned in an asynchronous notification and facilitates notification management. The maximum length of the user data is 2,048 bytes.
